TaskDefaults.Title: Prepare biology assignment on cell structure
TaskDefaults.Description: Break this into clear subtasks: gather sources, skim and note key points, draft outline, write first draft, create labeled diagrams, revise for clarity, final proofread and submit.

ModifyRequest: Subtask 3 (draft outline) is too generic. Please split into: introduction focus, section headings, bullet points per section, and estimate time per section.
